name: I have no idea what I'm shooting
name_original: I have no idea what I'm shooting
description:
Controls

WASD - Move

Left-Click - Shoot

Right-Click - Reload / Clone

Story

When a dog tries to get infinite treats by cloning them...

But then the treats mutate and start to go after the dog - when it was supposed to be the other way around...

Luckily she has a lab-gun to shoot the evil treats...

But she doesn't have any fingers and which makes it impossible to press the 'Reload'-Button without also pressing the 'Clone everything'-Button....

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #16 with the theme: Clones

Credits

Made by FIRECHICK

Linda Treffler - Art

Julian Treffler - Programming

SFX taken from soundsnap.com

Music by Karugamo BGM
